bibl.title: Alcman's Partheneion PMG 1, 13-15. Αἶσα, Πόρος and ἀπέδιλος ἀλκά: their Past and Present.
bibl.note: P. Paris Louvre Inv. E 3320; Nouveau No. 71 (= Pack2 78), 13-15. Supplements lines 13-15: κράτησε γ]ὰρ Αἶσα παντῶν | καὶ Πόρος] γεραίτατοι: | ἔγεντ’ ἀπ]έδιλος Ἀλκά, "For the Destiny and the Path, the oldest of all, subdued them; their Defence proved to be shoeless", that is, exposed and unprotected, whence vulnerable and, by extension, insufficient and ineffective.
bibl.seg: TSITSIBAKOU-VASALOS Evanthia, Alcman's Partheneion PMG 1, 13-15. Αἶσα, Πόρος and ἀπέδιλος ἀλκά: their Past and Present.

P. Paris Louvre Inv. E 3320; Nouveau No. 71 (= Pack2 78), 13-15. Supplements lines 13-15: κράτησε γ]ὰρ Αἶσα παντῶν | καὶ Πόρος] γεραίτατοι: | ἔγεντ’ ἀπ]έδιλος Ἀλκά, "For the Destiny and the Path, the oldest of all, subdued them; their Defence proved to be shoeless", that is, exposed and unprotected, whence vulnerable and, by extension, insufficient and ineffective.
